asprino-etal-2022-uncovering.title: Uncovering Values: Detecting Latent Moral Content from Natural Language with Explainable and Non-Trained Methods
asprino-etal-2022-uncovering.author:
Asprino, Luigi  and
Bulla, Luana  and
De Giorgis, Stefano  and
Gangemi, Aldo  and
Marinucci, Ludovica  and
Mongiovi, Misael
asprino-etal-2022-uncovering.paperMotivationText: Rapidly extracting moral values from text would enable a deeper understanding of social interaction dynamics.
asprino-etal-2022-uncovering.paperContributionText: They propose two architectures for moral value detection in tweets: zero-shot language models fine-tuned on NLI data and a frame-based model that uses information from knowledge graphs.
asprino-etal-2022-uncovering.paperResultsText: Their proposed architectures achieve considerable performance without the need to train/fine-tune on a moral values detection training set.
